title: Strange Plants
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 445 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 530L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     N and Q
description: Do you know that some plants eat meat? Some even steal food from other plants. Strange Plants is an informative look at unusual plants that exist in the world. Detailed photographs accompany an engaging text about extraordinarily strange plants. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify main ideas and details and the proper use of adjectives. The book and lesson are also available for levels N and Q.
